item.title: Corny Beginnings
item.description: Early Beginnings The crew - hard at work - while we wait for the planter to prepare our rows for us. Joe delegates the setting out of our row markers. Howard’s mind is blown. Really a beutiful day to be outside! Row 202 - the extra special, very picturesque row. Timelapse of the planting of a row:
